title: Magic Spell Sound Effects Vol. I
description: A set of 60 powerful offensive and defensive spell sound effects from various schools of magic.
longDescription:
A set of 60 powerful offensive and defensive spell sound effects from various schools of magic.


Preview:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kNLtlOHRyns

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NUfzJw7aKHU

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BMrRVwy012U

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XdyEj1_4Ne4

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NVOr_Vbk45A
technicalDetails:
Features: 60 stereo .wav sound effects.


Files Included:

Dark Magic:


Corruption Spell Cast 1, Curse Spell Cast 1-2, Ghostly Spell Cast 1, Infection Spell Cast 1, Mind Control Spell Cast 1, Portal Spell Loop 1, Protection Spell Cast 1, Raise Dead Spell Cast 1, Shadow Bolt Spell Approach And Impact 1, Shadow Bolt Spell Flying By 1, Shadow Bolt Spell Flying Loop 1, Shadow Bolt Spell Impact 1, Shadow Spell Cast 1-2, Spell Cast 1-2, Summon Portal Spell Cast 1, Summon Zombie Spell Cast 1-2


Fire Magic:


Fireball Spell Flying By 1-5, Fireball Spell Impact 1-5, Fireball Approach And Impact 1-5, Fireball Spell Throw 1, Spell Cast 1-2, Firewall Spell Cast 1, Weak Spell Cast 1


Frost Magic:


Aura Spell Cast 1, Blizzard Spell Cast 1-2, Freeze Spell Cast 1-2, Ice Bolt Spell Approach And Impact 1-3, Ice Bolt Spell Flying By 1-3, Ice Bolt Spell Flying Loop 1-3, Ice Bolt Spell Impact 1-3, Spell Cast 1-2, Weak Spell Cast 1


Holy Magic:


Bless Spell Cast 1, Bright Spell Loop 1-2, Healing Spell Cast 1-2, Light Aura Spell Cast 1, Protection Spell Cast 1, Purify Spell Cast 1, Resurrection Spell Cast 1-2


Water Magic:


Area Spell Cast 1, Area Spell Loop 1, Attack Spell Splash Impact 1-2, Bubble Spell Cast 1, Healing Spell Cast 1-3, Protection Spell Cast 1-2


Number of Audio Waves: 60

Number of Audio Cues: 60

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: N/A

Minutes of audio provided: 3:48

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
